name: ListPullRequestCommits
description:
Retrieve up to 250 commits for a specific pull request.

Use this tool to get a list of commits associated with a particular pull request. This is useful when you want to review changes or keep track of modifications made in a pull request. For a complete list with more than 250 commits, consider using the List commits endpoint.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository, not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository. It is not case sensitive and should be given as a string.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: pull_request_number
parameters.description: The unique number identifying the pull request within the repository.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the pull request.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of commit results to return per page, up to a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: results_page_number
parameters.description: Specify the page number of commit results to fetch. Useful for paginating through commit lists.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: pull_number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the pull request.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the pull request.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
